Package com.facebook.buck.distributed.build_slave

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BuildRuleFinishedPublisher
    Used by Coordinator service to signal to local client that a rule has finished building remotely.
    DistBuildModeRunner  
    HeartbeatService.HeartbeatCallback
    Called at a regular interval to perform heartbeat operations.
    MinionModeRunner.BuildCompletionChecker
    Callback when the build has completed.
    MinionModeRunner.ThriftCall
    Encapsulates a Thrift call
    RemoteBuildModeRunner.FinalBuildStatusSetter
    Sets the final BuildStatus of the BuildJob.
    ThriftCoordinatorServer.EventListener
    Listen to ThriftCoordinatorServer events.
    UnexpectedSlaveCacheMissTracker
    Interface to track unexpected cache misses encountered on stampede build slaves.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActiveCoordinatorService
    Handles Coordinator requests while the build is actively running.
    BuildSlaveFinishedStatusEvent  
    BuildSlaveTimingStatsTracker
    Keeps track of BuildSlave timing statistics.
    BuildTargetsQueue  
    BuildTargetsQueueFactory
    Factory class for BuildTargetsQueue.
    CoordinatorAndMinionModeRunner  
    CoordinatorEventListener
    Listener to events from the Coordinator.
    CoordinatorModeRunner  
    DelegateAndGraphs
    Container class for the build engine delegate and both graphs.
    DelegateAndGraphs.Builder
    Builds instances of type DelegateAndGraphs.
    DelegateAndGraphsInitializer
    Initializes the build engine delegate, the target graph and the action graph.
    DelegateAndGraphsInitializerArgs
    Constructor arguments for DelegateAndGraphsInitializer.
    DelegateAndGraphsInitializerArgs.Builder
    Builds instances of type DelegateAndGraphsInitializerArgs.
    DistBuildChromeTraceRenderer
    Chrome trace generator for DistBuildTrace object.
    DistBuildSlaveExecutor  
    DistBuildSlaveExecutorArgs
    Immutable implementation of AbstractDistBuildSlaveExecutorArgs.
    DistBuildSlaveExecutorArgs.Builder
    Builds instances of type DistBuildSlaveExecutorArgs.
    DistBuildTrace
    Snapshot of coordinator rule execution history.
    DistBuildTrace.RuleTrace
    Single build rule information.
    DistBuildTraceTracker
    This class tracks start and stop timestamp for build rules processed by stamepede minions.
    HeartbeatService
    Makes sure the clients send constant heartbeats to the servers to report healthy.
    IdleCoordinatorService
    Handles Coordinator requests while the build is still idle waiting for everything to be initialized.
    MinionHealthTracker
    Tracks the health of Minions to make sure they don't silently die and the build hangs.
    MinionLocalBuildStateTracker
    Keeps track of everything that is being built by the local minion
    MinionModeRunner  
    MinionWorkloadAllocator
    Allocates and keeps track of what BuildTargets are allocated to which Minions.
    MultiSlaveBuildModeRunnerFactory
    Factory for multi-slave implementations of DistBuildModeRunners.
    NoOpUnexpectedSlaveCacheMissTracker
    NoOp implementation of UnexpectedSlaveCacheMissTracker.
    RemoteBuildModeRunner
    Executes stampede in remote build mode.
    ThriftCoordinatorClient
    This class is ThreadSafe.
    ThriftCoordinatorServer  
    ThriftCoordinatorServer.ExitState
    Information about the exit state of the Coordinator.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    BuildSlaveTimingStatsTracker.SlaveEvents
